The final shape should be a cylindrical object with a slightly tapered top and bottom. It has a reflective surface and appears to be made of a shiny material. The object is symmetrical along its central axis and contains a smaller cylindrical object intersecting it.</description>

Step 5: Extrude the Sketch Extrude the sketch along the negative Z-axis by a distance of 0.6325 units.
